document.full_text: a decision on a contentious olympic rule that could impact on dozens of athletes wanting to compete in the 2012 london games is expected within the next four months, the court of arbitration for sport (cas) said on wednesday.
document.title: cas to decide on controversial ioc rule by september
lines_and_colors: a decision on a contentious olympic rule that could impact on dozens of athletes wanting to compete in the 2012 london games is expected within the next four months, the court of arbitration for sport (cas) said on wednesday.
